column4: i have a folder with sub folders/files.  how do i set permissons to all?? GUI
i have a folder with sub folders/files.  how do i set permissons to all?? GUI
press alt+f2, then type find /folder/ -iname * --exec chmod 777 {}\;  no better idea :D
: actually the command is "find /whatever/ -exec chmod 777 {} \;" sorry
